about.title: I am Franco Galluccio
about.subtitle: I am a Full Stack Web Developer
about.description01: I am a highly motivated professional, with demonstrated skills in proactivity, responsibility and teamwork. I stand out for my ability to quickly adapt to new environments and face challenges with creativity and determination. My commitment to excellence leads me to deliver high-quality results and consistently meet deadlines.
about.description02: Additionally, I have strong communication and collaboration skills, allowing me to work effectively with colleagues and clients. I am always willing to learn and contribute positively to the team's success.

services.description01: Solutions based on creative designs. I transform ideas into captivating visual experiences, combining innovation and aesthetics to capture the client's full attention.
services.description02: I take your brand to new levels, creating distinctive identities that reflect the essence of the business, helping you stand out and connect with your audience in an authentic way.
services.description03: I improve interaction with elegant and functional user interfaces, designing intuitive experiences that facilitate navigation, ensuring fluidity and attractiveness.
services.description04: I put the user at the center of everything I do. My user experience service focuses on creating smooth, immersive journeys that make users feel valued and understood.
services.description05: Quality and clarity are the foundation of my code. By offering a clean code service, you can rely on robust, secure and scalable solutions that will drive your project forward in the long term.
services.description06: Fast, efficient support is just a click away. My responsibility for potential technical issues ensures you always have the support you need to keep business running.

projects.description01: Online store for a brewery, built with React. Includes route navigation, global state management with Context, custom styles with Material UI and adaptable to all screens. Clean and functional design allows customers to explore and buy craft beers with ease.
projects.description02: Institutional Landing Page, created with Next.js. It is based on an elegant Figma design adaptable to all screens, using the SASS preprocessor to stylize dynamically. The page offers a fluid and attractive experience, reflecting the professional image of the company.
projects.description03: Institutional Landing Page, developed with Next.js and Typescript for greater robustness. The design follows a Figma model and uses SASS for custom styles. This page presents an interactive flow and clearly shows the benefits of the service.
projects.description04: E-commerce platform for a hamburger chain, developed with a Full Stack approach. User and role management, products, carts and other functionalities are part of this project. The backend uses Express.js and MongoDB, while the frontend uses Handlebars for a dynamic design. Special emphasis on layered architecture, which guarantees safe and efficient code.
projects.description05: Online clothing store, created in collaboration with another developer. It allows you to navigate between the different categories, manage users, add products to favorites, create a shopping cart, among others. Backend built with Express.js and MongoDB, while the frontend uses React and Vite for rapid response. The project stands out for its coordination and teamwork.
projects.description06: CRM type project to manage users and QR codes related to pet data, where the client will be able to print the QR code on a badge and when scanning it, it will redirect them to a landing page with the data related to their pet. The frontend uses Next.js, Typescript and SASS for a modern design, while the backend is based on Express.js and MongoDB, following a layered architecture for security and efficiency.

resume.description01: As a Frontend Developer at Notimation, I work on creating attractive and functional user interfaces, implementing reusable components and interacting with servers for data management through APIs. In addition, I have developed custom solutions, collaborating with multidisciplinary teams to deliver high quality products.
resume.description02: My path to becoming a Full Stack developer, where I embark on an exciting learning journey with the MERN technology stack: MongoDB, Express.js, React and Node.js. Throughout my course, I also I familiarized you with complementary tools such as Git for version control, Docker for containerization, and cloud-related technologies to deploy your applications. The learning was not only technical, but also collaborative, allowing me to work on team projects, practice agile methodologies. and receive constructive feedback.
resume.description03: During my time in high school, where I completed a bachelor's degree in natural sciences, I had the opportunity to immerse myself in a fascinating world of discovery and learning. This educational approach allowed me to explore topics related to biology, chemistry and physics, expanding my knowledge about the functioning of the natural world and its phenomena.
